trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
This class cannot be inherited.

When sorting is enabled by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowSorting%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control to `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> controls are rendered in the header of each column that has the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.SortExpression%2A> property set.

(For automatically generated columns, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.SortExpression%2A> property contains the same value as the data field.) These links allow you to sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control by the selected column.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control is clicked.
For a list of initial property values for an instance of DataGridSortCommandEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs"></xref> class.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs> class.
When an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs> is created by a call to this constructor, the following properties are initialized to the specified values.

|Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|The value of the `commandSource` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.SortExpression%2A>|The value of the `dce.CommandArgument` parameter.|
The source of the command.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Gets the source of the command.
Use the CommandSource property to get the command source that raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand> event.

Because this event is raised only when a link is clicked in the header of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, the returned source is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object that represents the header.
This property can be used to programmatically control the header.
The source of the command.
Gets the expression used to sort the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
Use the SortExpression property to determine which column the user selected to sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
The expression used to sort the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
